评论概述: Cute online but not in person 👎🏻
评论详情: I’m sad to say that I thought the overall quality of this shoe was very cheap looking. The fit wasn’t great either. I’m typically a 10.5 in a similar style and these the fit was just off. But even if they did fit I still would have returned them because of the overall quality.

The color of these flat pointed toe slingback shoes is a perfect navy blue. The textured grain embedded in the leather gives them an expensive, tailored look, and I love the cute, rounded, square heel. These shoes are versatile enough to wear with dresses and skirts, but I find them better suited for casual outfits like jeans, but that's subjective.  I normally wear a size 7; sometimes a 6.5, and I went with the 6.5 for these. It fits, though a 7 might have been better for my heel. But because they are very pointed, I think the enlongated point of the shoe would have made a half size up look overly large, so for that reason I'm happy with my choice.  The price is hefty at $138, but they are a stylish and versatile pair of shoes that offer many options of wear - from casual to chic.  Unfortunately, they lack arch support and are very flat, which might not work for everyone.

This is my 3rd pair of shoes from this brand and I have to say they have been on point with their shoes. They are elegant and classy. Great quality. I love the design of this flat, it’s simple and modern. The pointed toe style is great to wear with wide leg jeans giving you an elevated and up to date look. This blue color flat is beautiful and will pair nicely with jeans. A subtle snakeskin design. The bottom sole does have grips. I’m a true 6.5 in shoes and they fit perfect, which is 37 in European size. My only gripe, is the price. It is pricey and not many people want to spend over $100 for a pair of flats. But overall, these are nice and comfortable. If you don’t have a budget, I recommend bcoz they are beautiful.
I love these shoes!  I do wish they were a bit more red, but still the color is beautiful and they are so soft and comfortable.

评论概述: Soo cool, comfy and sexy.. without the discomfort of high heels!
评论详情: Omg, I’m obsessed with these shoes right now! They’re so classy cool - pointed toes, so sexy. The croc pattern without the high price? Yes please. The color is the perfect gray neutral… it goes with everything.  The sizing is spot on, too. My feet measure 9.25” long and I usually take a size 9 in shoes. These fit like a dream, even with the pointed toe. (check out the photos.. you'll see the pointed part of the shoe happens well past where your toes are. So don't worry about squishing.)  I would recommend getting your usual size, unless you have wider width feet. (check the size chart, it has some helpful tips.)

I didn't have any issues with quality as shoe is in new condition. I have a small foot and feel this shoe elongated my foot enough. I sadly won't be keeping the pair as I needed them for a trip to Paris and don't believe it would be great for long walks with how loose it fits. If it were for any other reason I believe I could make them work.
Not leather, bottom is separating! I thought it was Italian made. Is made in China glue pretty bad 😞

I searched high and low for this specific pointed toe sling back no heal style, AND with genuine leather. I was willing to pay for the price solely because it showed 100% genuine leather. Today I saw it’s on sale and cheaper than what I paid for, and I just found out that the material description changed to “lamb leather mixed with vegan leather.” So upsetting :( It’s cute, not the most comfy shoes, but for the style, it’s bearable.

I can do network marketing in my area with cute shoes & not have to worry about comfort as well! Although, I should be size 6 not 5. It's alright when you wear ankle socks! I'm still short so it wouldn't matter.

评论概述: Runs 1 whole size large. Order down.
评论详情: I’m a true sample size 6/36 (us/Euro) I ordered another pair from this brand in their 6, but it was a 7. (37) Their European sizes are off.  With this pair, I ordered this in their 5 knowing it would be my correct size 36. You can see on the bottom of the shoe it reads 36 which is a 6, not a 5.  These are best for a medium width foot. I have a narrow to medium foot and they fit great. A wider foot might find this too tight.  Okay, sizing issue aside, these shoes are very nice. Not sure if they’re $128 nice, but you can decide on that. The soles are rubber, not leather. They have a strong rubber/plastic smell. There’s a clear peel off adhesive sticker on the soles that you need to peel off before wearing, or you’ll slip and fall.  I think these are cute business professional shoes, but at this price point I’ve seen better construction.

The front top edge cuts into my foot a bit (where im pointing in the photo) but some new shoes will do that until you wear them enough times and could also be that my feet are fat.  I'll have to put some tape there so they don't make a blister. The only thing that's leather on this is the top part and the rest is visibly low quality stiff plastic. I wouldn't say these are worth the regular price for me. The color is lovely and they are actually decently comfortable.

It is hard to find comfortable and stylish shoe these days.  I accidentally order size 5 since I am a regular size 6.  However, the shoe still fits me comfortably.  It is made from good leather for sure. I have wide flat foot and this feels just right.  The ankle strap has some elasticity.  The heel height is so comfortable.  I can easily put on the shoes and be out of the door. I think I am going to check out this brand for awhile since I am very well satisfy with the shoe quality.

These shoes are beautiful. The design is delicate and light.  The color is just barely off white.  The surface of the shoes has a minor crinkle texture which makes them more unique.  These flats work well for dancing at your wedding or wearing to a formal business function.  I recommend them!

评论概述: How gorgeous and elegant these pair of shoes are! 🥰
评论详情: The very first C.Paravano shoes that actually fit me perfectly and that feels extremely soft and comfortable all around. 😍 I usually wear size 5.5 on sandals and pump shoes, which C.Paravano doesn’t carry any half sizes shoes. I’ve purchased their size 6 pump shoes and they were too big and hollow on me. The size 5 pump shoes were too tight on me. None of these pump shoes felt comfortable to walk in either, despite them being made of lamb leather. Finally, I purchased these “Slingback Flats for Women | Pink Flat Ankle Strap | Womens Slingbacks Pumps | Pointed Toe Slingback Flats | Womens Slingback Flats | Slingback Shoes(Size 5),” and they fit me perfectly. Not only that, they’re one of the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever worn! I think that these style fits me perfectly despite it being a half size smaller than what I normally wear, is because they’re sling backs, giving the back of my heels extra room. Other than that, I would not be able to fit in any of their pump shoes unless, they start carrying half sizes.  As for the quality of these shoes, they are very well-crafted and durably made, with a special focus on not just looks but, also on comfort. This shade of light pink, which is more like rose or coral pink, is absolutely stunning and chic to look at. The leather is soft, smooth, durable, and finished with excellent stitching all around. The sling back is so comfortable and not too tight and not loose either. The flat heels along with a soft and cushioned footbed feels like I’m walking on a cloud. These shoes will look absolutely stunning to go with semi-formal outfits like slacks, nice skirt and a top, or with a nice dress or business suit.  That said, I absolutely recommend these pink sling back shoes to others, as these are totally worth the asking price. Hope this review helps. Thank you! 💝

They also fit true to size, and stay comfortably fashionable for long periods of time. Get these!
